inlineContent.text: The intended recipients of the message.
The contents of the message.
The name of a group that should receive the message. Specify
if you do not want to send the message to a group address.
The unique identifier for the message conversation. Specify
if your app does not assign identifiers to conversations between users.
The specific service to use when sending the message. You may specify
if your app has only one way of sending messages.
The person that created the message.
An initialized intent or
if the object could not be created.

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
Information about a person participating in a SiriKit interaction.
A request to send a message to the designated recipients.
The name of the group to receive the message.

A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
